entry.title: Combined summary - Changing PGP identities/keys
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik has sent a message announcing that he is switching to jgarzik at bitpay.com as his PGP identity and will be using new signing keys. He has provided two links for verification purposes and requested individuals to confirm his identity through a sig check and IRC ack. After the switch, Bitcoin.org will be updated accordingly. The message includes Jeff Garzik's business identity and PGP information and is signed by his exmulti.com key.
